question.questionText: Emily evaporated a solution and drew a picture of the crystals that remained. Using the crystal-shape key below, what was dissolved in the solution? A. Epsom salt (B. alum) C. sodium thiosulfate. Explain why you chose that answer.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The crystals are the same shape as the alum crystals.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because the minerals on the top look just the same as alum on the bottom.
